text: @realDonaldTrump @FoxNews Enjoy? This is a freaking PANDEMIC & you impulsively tell people to enjoy? These people don’t know if they can pay their rent/mortgage-These are the same 70% of Americans who don’t have $1000 in savings-& you keep bragging about the STOCK MARKET. 50% of Americans don’t own stock.
